quote: I don’t remember my birth. I guess I got dementia at a young age.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: One is not born, but rather becomes, a woman.
author: Simone de Beauvoir,  The Second Sex

quote: Birth after birth the line unchanging runs,And fathers live transmitted in their sons;Each passing year beholds the unvarying kinds,The same their manners, and the same their minds:Till, as erelong successive buds decay,And insect-shoals successive pass away,Increasing wants the pregnant parent vexWith the fond wish to form a softer sex. ..
author: Erasmus Darwin,  The Temple Of Nature

quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: A birth-date is a reminder to celebrate the life as well as to update the life.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: I've been the oldest child since before you were born
author: E.L. Konigsburg,  From the Mixed-Up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler

quote: When you were born you were crying and everyone else was smiling. Live your life so at the end, your're the one who is smiling and everyone else is crying.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Human beings are not born once and for all on the day their mothers give birth to them, but ... life obliges them over and over again to give birth to themselves.
author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez

quote: Birth and death: there was the same consciousness of heightened existence and of her own elevated importance
author: J.K. Rowling,  The Casual Vacancy

quote: The whole life of the individual is nothing but the process of giving birth to himself; indeed, we should be fully born when we die - although it is the tragic fate of most individuals to die before they are born.
author: Erich Fromm,  The Sane Society

quote: I was born when you kissed me. I died when you left me. I lived a few weeks while you loved me.
author: Dorothy B. Hughes,  In a Lonely Place

quote: There are words in the soul of a newborn baby, wanting and waiting to be written.
author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: Our birth is but a sleep and a forgetting:The Soul that rises with us, our life's Star,Hath had elsewhere its setting,And cometh from afar:Not in entire forgetfulness,And not in utter nakedness,But trailing clouds of glory do we come
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Having a baby is one of the most wonderful things in your life, as well as the hardest thing in your life.
author: Nuno Bettencourt

quote: I wish I had never been born,"she said. "What are we born for?""For infinite happiness,"said the Spirit. "You can step out into it at any moment...
author: C.S. Lewis,  The Great Divorce

quote: You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: When we recognise the virtues, the talent, the beauty of Mother Earth, something is born in us, some kind of connection; love is born.
author: Nhat Hanh

quote: Nothing is born into this world without labor.
author: Rob Liano

quote: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: After your death, you will be what you were before your birth.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: You were born a child of light’s wonderful secret— you return to the beauty you have always been.
author: Aberjhani,  Visions of a Skylark Dressed in Black

quote: You were born to unlock your consciousness and be universal and infinite.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The day of my birth, my death began its walk. It is walking toward me, without hurrying.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: Being born is like being kidnapped. And then sold into slavery.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Birth and death were easy. It was life that was hard.
author: Tom Robbins,  Jitterbug Perfume

quote: You may be born thousands of years from now, but over the boundaries of time I am sending you my love and wishing you a joyful and wonderful life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
author: William Barclay

quote: After all, what's a life, anyway? We're born, we live a little while, we die.
author: E.B. White,  Charlotte's Web

quote: We are not born into the world. We are born into something that we make into the world.
author: Michael Talbot,  Mysticism and the New Physics

quote: Life is like a sandwich!Birth as one slice,and death as the other.What you put in-between the slices is up to you.Is your sandwich tasty or sour?Allan Rufus.org
author: Allan Rufus

quote: You were born with a song in the seat of your soul; let the life that you live be the singing of it.
author: LaShaun Middlebrooks Collier

quote: CHOOSE WISELY'Birth wasn't your choice, and neither shall death be.But the way you live your lifeis your choice, buddy.
author: Maddy Malhotra,  How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

quote: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Birth, life, and death― each took place on the hidden side of a leaf.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: We are born of love; Love is our mother.
author: Rumi

quote: When man becomes greater than nature, nature, which gave us birth, will respond.
author: Loren Eiseley

quote: Here, in this quiet place we own, worlds are born.
author: Cassandra Wilson Run the Voodoo Down

quote: A baby is God's opinion that the world should go on.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Neither were you [born yesterday], unless of course I am wrong, in which case welcome to the world, little baby, and congratulations on learning to read so early in life.
author: Lemony Snicket,  The Penultimate Peril

quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Pregnancy is something that I always love. It's about hope and the future and a new baby.
author: Carine Roitfeld

quote: For the newborn and wise, everything begins small.
author: Suzy Kassem,  Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Friends are born, not made.
author: Henry Adams

quote: Born to be wild; born to be free; nobody owns you; you are, a romantic tree.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: I’m an only child, and therefore I gave birth to my parents, because if it weren’t for me, they wouldn’t even be parents.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: All my best writing was written before 1982, and then a significant event happened to me: I was born.
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.

quote: We can't understand when we're pregnant, or when our siblings are expecting, how profound it is to have a shared history with a younger generation: blood, genes, humor. It means we were actually here, on Earth, for a time - like the Egyptians with their pyramids, only with children.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Like roses we are born, we grow and expand, in knowledge and bliss, and when our time is due our bodies return to mother Nature.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: You were born with potential. You were born with goodness and trust. You were born with ideals and dreams. You were born with greatness. You were born with wings. You are not meant for crawling, so don't. You have wings. Learn to use them and fly.
author: Rumi

quote: There is just as much beauty in birth as there is in death, and it changes our lives just the same. They both add things to us and take things away."Pg. 155 Undone
author: Brooke Taylor,  Undone
